H0.text: What type of creature is a fennec. Jackal

H1.text: What type of creature is a fennec. Hyena

H2.text: What type of creature is a fennec. Mongoose

H3.text: What type of creature is a fennec. Fox

A4.text: The fennec fox (Vulpes zerda) is a small fox native to the deserts of North Africa, ranging from Western Sahara and Mauritania to the Sinai Peninsula.

A5.text: The fennec fox is one of 13 extant Vulpes species and a member of the family Canidae.
